# Nano Banana 2 - AI Image Generator Platform

## About
Nano Banana 2 is an AI-powered image generation and editing platform that provides access to multiple state-of-the-art AI models for text-to-image generation and image editing. The platform supports various resolution options (1K, 2K, 4K) and offers a user-friendly interface for creating AI-generated artwork.

## Website
https://nanobanana2.online

## Supported Languages
- Chinese (zh)
- English (en)
- Japanese (ja)
- French (fr)
- German (de)
- Russian (ru)

## Main Features
- Text-to-Image Generation: Create images from text prompts using various AI models
- Image Editing: Edit and modify existing images with AI assistance
- Multiple Resolution Options: Generate images in 1K, 2K, and 4K resolutions
- Showcase Gallery: Browse examples of AI-generated artwork
- API Testing: Test API endpoints and functionality
- User Account Management: Credits system, billing, and subscription management

## Supported AI Models
- Nano Banana 2: Advanced image generation model
- SeeDream 4.0: High-quality image generation model
- GPT Series: Text-to-image models via OpenRouter
- Gemini 2.5 Flash Image: Fast image generation model
- Gemini 3 Pro Image: Professional image generation model
- Doubao SeeDream 4.0: Via Volcano Engine API

## Public Pages
- Home: https://nanobanana2.online/
- Showcase: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/showcase
- Pricing: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/pricing
- API Test: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/api-test
- Terms: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/privacy
- Cookies Policy: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/cookies
- Login: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/login

## Protected Pages (Require Authentication)
- Editor: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/editor
- Account: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/account
- Billing: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/billing
- Settings: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/settings
- Admin Panel: https://nanobanana2.online/{lang}/admin

## API Endpoints
The platform uses Cloudflare Functions for API proxying:

- OpenRouter API Proxy: /api/openrouter
  - Method: POST
  - Purpose: Proxy requests to OpenRouter for GPT series models
  - Requires: API key in environment variables

- Volcano Engine API Proxy: /api/volcano
  - Method: POST
  - Purpose: Proxy requests to Volcano Engine for Doubao SeeDream models
  - Endpoints:
    - /api/volcano/chat/completions
    - /api/volcano/images/generations

- New API Provider: /api/new-api-provider/chat/completions
  - Method: POST
  - Purpose: Alternative API provider for Gemini models

- User Registration: /api/register-user
  - Method: POST
  - Purpose: Register new user accounts

- Email Service: /api/send-signup-email
  - Method: POST
  - Purpose: Send signup confirmation emails

- Gumroad Webhook: /api/gumroad-webhook
  - Method: POST
  - Purpose: Handle Gumroad payment webhooks

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React 18 with Vite
- Routing: React Router DOM
- Authentication: Supabase
- Payment: PayPal, Gumroad, FastSpring
- Hosting: Cloudflare Pages
- API Proxying: Cloudflare Functions

## Usage Guidelines
- Users must create an account to access the image editor
- Credits system: Users purchase credits to generate images
- Subscription plans available for regular users
- Generated images are owned by the user
- Users must comply with terms of service and content policies

## Content Policy
- No generation of illegal, harmful, or offensive content
- Respect intellectual property rights
- Follow platform terms of service
- Generated content should comply with applicable laws

## Disclaimer
Nano Banana 2 is an independent product and is not affiliated with Google or other AI model providers. The platform provides access to AI models through custom interfaces.
